question: Mahatma Gandhi was lodged in which jail when Congress Volunteers made a raid on Dharasana Salt Depot?
explanation: Mahatma Gandhi was already arrested and lodged in Yerwada Jail when a raid was made by Congress Volunteers on Dharasana salt depot. Sarojini Naidu, Imam Sahib and Manilal took up the task of leading a raid on Dharasana salt works on 21st May, 1930.
